description: This file defines the LicensesActivity class, an Android activity that displays open source licenses using a WebView. It sets up UI components, loads license HTML content from resources, and handles menu actions to navigate to a settings activity.

classes.name: LicensesActivity
classes.description: An Android activity that shows a static list of open source licenses loaded from a raw HTML resource, integrating a WebView with restricted settings.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up the UI components, configures the WebView, and loads license HTML content from resources.

methods.name: onCreateOptionsMenu
methods.description: Inflates the menu options for the activity.

methods.name: onOptionsItemSelected
methods.description: Handles menu item selections, including navigation to a SettingsActivity.
